(Well I think that I messed all, What do you think if we come back with the=
 fight Horn-dril vs Najah and we forget the lats mails?)
  ----- Original M=
essage ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, =
October 26, 2000 9:43 PM
  Subject: Re: War


  OOC: Hey, Shokaract just fi=
red, Zardus is the one who made the arm blow off.
  And I'm sorry, I got yo=
u mixed up with JP. I almost got kicked out for
  making such a big gestalt=
, he was 30 feet tall and JP actually kicked me
  out. Well, he didn't remo=
ve me from egroups, and I just corrected the
  mistake and backed up everyt=
hing I did. And I can't RP a gestalt correctly?
  I have been doing it for =
some time, now...


  > Dark One barrell rolled, escaping autogun fire, let=
ting two missiles loose
  > downward at the Mafia Base.

  (Ay ay ay) Base =
damage: Not much, as usual, except the shields were weakened
  by the more =
powerful than grenade, thingies...

  > Breakdown cursed, not seeing any bo=
dy parts fly.  He obviously hadn't hit
  a
  > target.  He fired off a gren=
ade at Shokaract.

  Shokaract hadn't expected a grenade. It blasted on him=
. He got up with a
  groan, looking for the damaged area. He knew where it =
was when he seen an
  arm missing. He grabbed the Gattling Gun with his lef=
t hand and fired a
  missile at Breakdown, fireing the other 2 missiles at =
WarMachine.

  > The three missiles explode, driving Pyro back several feet=
, leaving the
  front
  > end of his tank mode dented and charred.  "FLAMES=
 CAN'T HURT ME!" he
  > screamed, firing off three fire balls at Shokaract.=


  (Why is it when you attack you make a bunch of guys attack the same bot=
? You
  think you can psyche people out?) Shokaract leapt out of the way, l=
anding
  irregularly but it didn't matter, he was missing his right arm any=
way.

  > Hiss fired off three fusion blasts at Shokaract.

  Shokaract is =
hit in the head by the blast, his horns on one side falling off
  and clatt=
ering to the ground. Shokaract gets angry, he jumps up and gets
  ready for=
 another attack. His smaller gun mounted on his back. (The figure
  can do =
that, Rampage can, so I guess Shokaract can, too.)

  > Serpentor hissed, c=
harging Shokaract, his energy blade in one hand, his
  > plasma rifle in th=
e other.  "Time to die!" he yelled as he fired off three
  > bolts from his=
 rifle at Shokaract's abdomen.

  (Yep, at Shokaract, Serge is there, you k=
now.) Shokaract cartwheeled out of
  the way with the crab legs on his shou=
lders. He fired from the little gun, 2
  shots at Serpentor. Serge fires 2 =
missiles at Serpentor.


        eGroups Sponsor
